alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wheatland and northeastern Golden Valley Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Deadmans Basin Reservoir, or 14 miles east of Harlowton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deadmans Basin Reservoir and Shawmut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
